testsuite.name: CryptoSquareTest

testcase.name: letters are lower cased during encryption
nine character plaintext results in three chunks of three characters

testsuite.system-out: size: 0 r: -1 c: 0 size: 54 r: 6 c: 7 chunkedList: [Ifmanwa, smeantt, ostayon, thegrou, ndgodwo, uldhave, givenus, roots] size: 8 r: 2 c: 3 chunkedList: [Chi, llo, ut] size: 1 r: 0 c: 1 chunkedList: [1] invertedList: [1] size: 1 r: 0 c: 1 chunkedList: [A] invertedList: [a] size: 9 r: 2 c: 3 chunkedList: [Thi, sis, fun] invertedList: [tsf, hiu, isn] size: 1 r: 0 c: 1 chunkedList: [b] invertedList: [b]
